game.name: Sunset Motel
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 방치된 객실을 혁신할 준비가 되셨나요? 고객 만족을 보장하고, 인테리어를 리노베이션하고, 엔터테인먼트 공간을 디자인하세요! 나만의 스타일로 모텔을 관리하고 여행객에게 잊을 수 없는 경험을 선사하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ready for the transformation of neglected rooms? Ensure customer satisfaction, renovate interiors, design entertainment spaces! Manage your motel in your own style and provide travelers with unforgettable experiences!

reviewHighlights.text: My little sister introduced me to this game, streamed herself playing to show me the gameplay. I genuinely thought the concept and mechanics were pret...
